name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_DAY】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [5NbNvtpj2-c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs a high-energy song during her live concert 'Dreams in Motion'.
MC section: Tokino Sora greets the audience, wishes them a Happy New Year, and talks about the scale of the venue.

subtitles.original: おはよう！あてに今日もおご挨拶
subtitles.english: Good morning! Another greeting addressed to you today.

subtitles.original: てあれ？嘘！もうこんな時間？
subtitles.english: Wait, what? No way! Is it this time already?

subtitles.original: 午後から予定あるのに
subtitles.english: I have plans for the afternoon...

subtitles.original: すぐに支度をしなきゃ！行ってきます！
subtitles.english: ...so I have to get ready right away! I'm off!

subtitles.original: 慌てて飛び出して気づく
subtitles.english: I rushed out only to realize...

subtitles.original: こっちじゃないここどこ？助けてあん肝！
subtitles.english: ...it's not this way! Where am I? Help me, Ankimo!

subtitles.original: トラブルばっか転んで起きての毎日です
subtitles.english: It's just trouble after trouble, falling and getting up every day.

subtitles.original: 何でも思い通りとかそんな美味しい話はないから
subtitles.english: Things going exactly as planned—there's no such sweet deal.

subtitles.original: 心の曇り空を晴らす合言葉唱えて
subtitles.english: Reciting the magic words to clear the cloudy skies of the heart...

subtitles.original: ほら快晴でしょう！ずっと
subtitles.english: See, it's perfectly clear! Always...

subtitles.original: みんなに届けたい
subtitles.english: ...I want to reach everyone...

subtitles.original: 歌もダンスも元気も！
subtitles.english: ...with my songs, my dance, and my energy!

subtitles.original: きっとおなじ空の下
subtitles.english: Surely, under the same sky...

subtitles.original: 笑顔も分け合えるよ
subtitles.english: ...we can share our smiles.

subtitles.original: ちょっと疲れちゃうときも
subtitles.english: Even when I'm a bit tired...

subtitles.original: 涙が出そうなときも
subtitles.english: ...or when I'm about to cry...

subtitles.original: いつも魔法の言葉で
subtitles.english: ...always with the magic words...

subtitles.original: 今日もケセラセラのかな
subtitles.english: ...today is 'Que Sera Sera,' I guess.

subtitles.original: せーの！ケセラセラ！
subtitles.english: One, two! Que Sera Sera!

subtitles.original: みんなコンそら！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone, KonSora!

subtitles.original: 今日も一日頑張ろう！
subtitles.english: Let's do our best again today!

subtitles.original: カメラにマイクによし準備オッケー！
subtitles.english: Camera, mic—all set! Ready, okay!

subtitles.original: お水もちゃんとあるし
subtitles.english: I've got my water, too.

subtitles.original: 備えさえあれば嬉しいです
subtitles.english: If I'm prepared, I'm happy.

subtitles.original: それじゃ今日は何をしようかな？
subtitles.english: Well then, what should I do today?

subtitles.original: お歌に雑談に
subtitles.english: Singing, chatting...

subtitles.original: あ、ほらトラブルだ！
subtitles.english: Oh, see, here's some trouble!

subtitles.original: みんなと笑い飛ばせば
subtitles.english: If I laugh it off with everyone...

subtitles.original: また明日も晴れ晴れだ！よっしゃ！
subtitles.english: ...tomorrow will be bright again! Alright!

subtitles.original: ほっと溜息こぼして
subtitles.english: Letting out a soft sigh...

subtitles.original: ふと夜空を見上げたら
subtitles.english: ...and happening to look up at the night sky...

subtitles.original: ぽっと満天の星たちが
subtitles.english: ...suddenly, the stars filling the heavens...

subtitles.original: キラキラ瞬いていた
subtitles.english: ...were sparkling and twinkling.

subtitles.original: ずっと追いかけ続けたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep chasing them...

subtitles.original: 雲より高い夢でも
subtitles.english: ...even if it's a dream higher than the clouds.

subtitles.original: もっと強く羽ばたいて
subtitles.english: I'll flap my wings even harder...

subtitles.original: 空まで駆けていくよ
subtitles.english: ...and run all the way to the sky.

subtitles.original: そっと背中を押すような
subtitles.english: When I'm wrapped in a warmth...

subtitles.original: ぬくもりに包まれたら
subtitles.english: ...that feels like a gentle push on my back...

subtitles.original: いつまでも止まんないよ
subtitles.english: ...I'll never stop.

subtitles.original: 今日も今日も、明日も明日も
subtitles.english: Today and today, tomorrow and tomorrow...

subtitles.original: ずっとケセラセラのかな
subtitles.english: ...it'll always be 'Que Sera Sera,' I guess.

subtitles.original: せーの！ケセラセラ！
subtitles.english: One, two! Que Sera Sera!

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: 新年明けまして
subtitles.english: Happy New Year...

subtitles.original: おめでとうございまーす！
subtitles.english: ...everyone!

subtitles.original: 本日はお寒い中
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming today...

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: ...despite the cold weather.

subtitles.original: みんな来れた？あ、来れてるからいるのわかる。
subtitles.english: Did everyone make it? Ah, I can see you're here, so of course you did.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと安全に来れましたかー？
subtitles.english: Did you all arrive here safely?

subtitles.original: え、今回のそらパは、えっと、私のライブ史上最大規模ということで
subtitles.english: So, this Sora Party is, well, my biggest live event ever...

subtitles.original: すごい大きな会場で、あの、ハッシュタグとかも見てたんだけど
subtitles.english: It's such a huge venue. I was looking at the hashtags, and...

subtitles.original: 「デカ！」って。
subtitles.english: ...people were saying, "It's huge!"

subtitles.original: 「デカいのすごいな」って書いてる人がいっぱいいて
subtitles.english: Lots of people wrote, "It's amazing how big it is,"

subtitles.original: 私も「デカいな、すごいな」って思いながら見てました。
subtitles.english: and I was also thinking "It's big, it's amazing" while looking at it.

subtitles.original: リハーサルの時は「ここにいっぱいそらともさん来るね」って言われて
subtitles.english: During rehearsals, I was told "Lots of Soratomos will come here,"

subtitles.original: 「え、誰もいないじゃん！誰もいないよ！
subtitles.english: and I was like, "Wait, there's no one! No one's here!

subtitles.original: 誰もいない…」っていう会話をしながらとっても楽しくやっておりました。
subtitles.english: No one..." We were having that kind of conversation and having a lot of fun.

subtitles.original: でもみんないるね！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: But you're all here! Thank you!

subtitles.original: というわけで、今日初めてライブだよって人ー！
subtitles.english: So, who's here for their very first live event?

subtitles.original: おおー、結構いるね！
subtitles.english: Ooh, quite a few of you!

subtitles.original: おおー、結構いるね！
subtitles.english: Ooh, quite a few of you!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、現地自体初めてだよって人ー！
subtitles.english: Then, how about those for whom being on-site is a first?

subtitles.original: 結構いる！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Quite a few! Thank you!

subtitles.original: じゃあ頑張って、あ、手振るだけでいいからね。
subtitles.english: Then please try—oh, just waving is fine.

subtitles.original: 女の子ー！
subtitles.english: Girls!

subtitles.original: 声出してくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for speaking up!

subtitles.original: きゃー！聞こえた！
subtitles.english: Kyaa! I heard you!

subtitles.original: 海外ニキニキー！
subtitles.english: Overseas brothers!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: え、これってあれ？ペンライトとかできるのかな？
subtitles.english: Er, can we do the thing with the penlights?

subtitles.original: まだできないのかな？できるかな？
subtitles.english: Maybe not yet? Can we?

subtitles.original: こちらの人、赤！
subtitles.english: People on this side, red!

subtitles.original: こちらの人は、青！
subtitles.english: People on this side, blue!

subtitles.original: 真ん中は黄色！
subtitles.english: The middle is yellow!
